job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p><strong>Responsibilities:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Create actionable recommendations and put code into production effecting a large population with cutting edge technology. </li><li>Create Training models, evaluating them, making sure they are fit for purpose. </li><li>Deliver actionable recommendations </li><li> Find and interpret rich data sources; manage large amounts of data despite hardware, software, and bandwidth constraints; merge data sources; ensure consistency of data sets; create visualizations to aid in understanding data; build mathematical models using the data; and present and communicate the data insights/findings.&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Requirements :</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li> Knowledge and experience in building and analyzing linear regression, logistic regression, generalized linear models, and time series models </li><li> Experience in converting business problems into statistical problems, building models to solve the statistical problem, then use the models to develop business recommendations to solve the business problem </li><li> Knowledge of optimization techniques and application to business problems </li><li> Experience in pulling data from multiple sources, cleaning the data, and preparing the data for analysis </li><li> Experience in using a structure workflow in their problem solving </li><li> Experience in using Git to manage model versions </li><li> Experience with R and Python</li><li> Three plus years of applying the above in a business environment </li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>PriceSenz is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or disability</p>
